scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix backend install --save-dev nodemon && npm --prefix backend install technicalindicators
scripts.setup:frontend: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend install react-router-dom axios recharts technicalindicators && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='./frontend/.env';if(!fs.existsSync(p)){fs.writeFileSync(p,'VITE_API_BASE=http://localhost:4000\n');console.log('Créé frontend/.env');}"
